title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: IndonesiAPIs package provides unified interface access open data World Bank API, Nager.Date API, REST Countries API, focus Indonesia. allows users retrieve --date historical information topics economic indicators, population statistics, national holidays, basic geopolitical details. addition API-access functions, package includes curated collection open datasets related Indonesia. datasets cover wide range topics including consumer prices, poverty probability, food prices region, tourism destinations, minimum wage statistics. IndonesiAPIs designed support users working data related Indonesia integrating international RESTful APIs structured reliable datasets public, academic, governmental sources single, easy--use R package.

title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: IndonesiAPIs package provides several core functions access real-time structured information Indonesia public APIs World Bank API, Nager.Date, REST Countries API. list main functions included package: get_indonesia_child_mortality(): Get -5 Mortality Rate Indonesia World Bank get_indonesia_cpi(): Get Indonesia’s Consumer Price Index World Bank get_indonesia_energy_use(): Get Indonesia’s Energy Use (kg oil equivalent per capita) World Bank get_indonesia_gdp(): Get Indonesia’s GDP (Current US$) World Bank get_indonesia_holidays(): Get official public holidays Indonesia given year, e.g. get_indonesia_holidays(2025) get_indonesia_hospital_beds(): Get Hospital Beds per 1,000 People Indonesia World Bank get_indonesia_life_expectancy(): Get Indonesia’s Life Expectancy Birth World Bank get_indonesia_literacy_rate(): Get Indonesia’s Literacy Rate (Age 15+) World Bank get_indonesia_population(): Get Indonesia’s Total Population World Bank get_indonesia_unemployment(): Get Indonesia’s Unemployment Rate World Bank get_country_info_idn(): Get Key Country Information Indonesia REST Countries API view_datasets_IndonesiAPIs(): View Available Datasets IndonesiAPIs functions allow users access high-quality structured information Indonesia, can combined tools like dplyr ggplot2 support wide range data analysis, visualization, research tasks. following sections, ’ll find examples work IndonesiAPIs practical scenarios.

what: Indonesia’s GDP (Current US$) from World Bank 2022 - 2017
title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
code: indonesia_gdp <- head(get_indonesia_gdp())  print(indonesia_gdp) #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>   indicator         country    year   value value_label       #>   <chr>             <chr>     <int>   <dbl> <chr>             #> 1 GDP (current US$) Indonesia  2022 1.32e12 1,319,101,183,380 #> 2 GDP (current US$) Indonesia  2021 1.19e12 1,186,509,691,087 #> 3 GDP (current US$) Indonesia  2020 1.06e12 1,059,054,842,698 #> 4 GDP (current US$) Indonesia  2019 1.12e12 1,119,099,871,350 #> 5 GDP (current US$) Indonesia  2018 1.04e12 1,042,271,532,989 #> 6 GDP (current US$) Indonesia  2017 1.02e12 1,015,618,744,160

what: Indonesia’s Life Expectancy at Birth from World Bank 2022 - 2017
title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
code: indonesia_life_expectancy <- head(get_indonesia_life_expectancy())  print(indonesia_life_expectancy) #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   indicator                               country    year value #>   <chr>                                   <chr>     <int> <dbl> #> 1 Life expectancy at birth, total (years) Indonesia  2022  70.9 #> 2 Life expectancy at birth, total (years) Indonesia  2021  67.5 #> 3 Life expectancy at birth, total (years) Indonesia  2020  68.8 #> 4 Life expectancy at birth, total (years) Indonesia  2019  70.3 #> 5 Life expectancy at birth, total (years) Indonesia  2018  70.1 #> 6 Life expectancy at birth, total (years) Indonesia  2017  70.0

what: Indonesia’s Total Population from World Bank 2022 - 2017
title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
code: indonesia_population <- head(get_indonesia_population())  print(indonesia_population) #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>   indicator         country    year     value value_label #>   <chr>             <chr>     <int>     <int> <chr>       #> 1 Population, total Indonesia  2022 278830529 278,830,529 #> 2 Population, total Indonesia  2021 276758053 276,758,053 #> 3 Population, total Indonesia  2020 274814866 274,814,866 #> 4 Population, total Indonesia  2019 272489381 272,489,381 #> 5 Population, total Indonesia  2018 269951846 269,951,846 #> 6 Population, total Indonesia  2017 267346658 267,346,658

what: Top 10 Regions with Highest Average Minimum Wage (2015-2023)
title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
code: # Bar chart with better formatted x-axis indonesia_minwage_tbl_df %>%   filter(YEAR >= 2015) %>%   group_by(REGION) %>%   summarise(avg_salary = mean(SALARY, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = 'drop') %>%   arrange(desc(avg_salary)) %>%   slice_head(n = 10) %>%   ggplot(aes(x = reorder(REGION, avg_salary), y = avg_salary)) +   geom_col(fill = "steelblue", alpha = 0.8) +   coord_flip() +   scale_y_continuous(     labels = function(x) format(x, big.mark = ",", scientific = FALSE)   ) +   labs(     title = "Top 10 Regions with Highest Average Minimum Wage (2015-2023)",     subtitle = "Indonesian Minimum Wage by Region",     x = "Region",     y = "Average Minimum Wage (IDR)",     caption = "Source: IndonesiAPIs package"   ) +   theme_minimal() +   theme(     plot.title = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold"),     plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 12),     axis.text = element_text(size = 10),     axis.title = element_text(size = 11)   )

title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: dataset IndonesiAPIs labeled suffix indicate structure type: _df: standard data frame. _tbl_df: tibble data frame object.

title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: addition API access functions, IndonesiAPIs offers curated collection open datasets focused Indonesia. preloaded datasets cover wide range topics including consumer prices, poverty probability, food prices region, tourism destinations, minimum wage statistics. featured examples: Bali_tbl_df: tibble containing food price data Bali, Indonesia. indonesia_minwage_tbl_df: tibble containing monthly minimum wage Upah Minimum Regional (UMR) data Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) across various regions Indonesia 1997 2025. DKIJakarta_tbl_df: tibble containing food price data DKI Jakarta, Indonesia.

title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: IndonesiAPIs package offers unified interface accessing real-time data public APIs curated collection datasets Indonesia. Covering wide spectrum topics economic indicators, holidays, demographic statistics via international APIs, detailed datasets consumer prices, poverty probability, food prices region, tourism destinations, minimum wage statistics, IndonesiAPIs provides users reliable, structured, high-quality data. Designed support reproducible research, education, data journalism, package empowers users analyze visualize Indonesia-focused data directly within R, using tidy formats well-documented sources.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Renzo Caceres Rossi. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Caceres Rossi R (2025). IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs Curated Datasets. doi:10.5281/zenodo.17731434, R package version 0.1.1, https://lightbluetitan.github.io/indonesiapis/.

title: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: dataset IndonesiAPIs labeled suffix indicate structure type: _df: standard data frame. _tbl_df: tibble data frame object.

title: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: addition API access functions, IndonesiAPIs offers curated collection open datasets focused Indonesia. preloaded datasets cover wide range topics including consumer prices, poverty probability, food prices region, tourism destinations, minimum wage statistics. featured examples: Bali_tbl_df: tibble containing food price data Bali, Indonesia. indonesia_minwage_tbl_df: tibble containing monthly minimum wage Upah Minimum Regional (UMR) data Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) across various regions Indonesia 1997 2025. DKIJakarta_tbl_df: tibble containing food price data DKI Jakarta, Indonesia.

title: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
code: # Load the package  library(IndonesiAPIs)  # Retrieves essential information about Indonesia  get_country_info_idn()  # Get Indonesia's Population (Total) from World Bank  get_indonesia_population()  # Load a dataset  data(DKIJakarta_tbl_df)  # Shows six rows of the dataset  head(DKIJakarta_tbl_df)  # Display the structure of the dataset  str(DKIJakarta_tbl_df)  # Shows the whole dataset  View(DKIJakarta_tbl_df)

title: Food Prices in Bali — Bali_tbl_df
text: dataset, Bali_tbl_df, tibble containing food price data Bali, Indonesia. includes prices various food items rice, chicken, beef, eggs, onions, chilies, cooking oil, sugar, recorded multiple observations.

title: Food Prices in Bali — Bali_tbl_df
Food Prices in Bali — Bali_tbl_df
text: tibble 1,043 observations 30 variables: Tanggal Date observation (character) Beras Price rice (numeric) Beras Kualitas Medium Price medium quality rice (numeric) Beras Kualitas Medium II Price medium quality rice II (numeric) Beras Kualitas Super Price super quality rice (numeric) Beras Kualitas Super II Price super quality rice II (numeric) Daging Ayam Price chicken meat (numeric) Daging Ayam Ras Segar Price fresh broiler chicken meat (numeric) Daging Sapi Price beef (numeric) Daging Sapi Kualitas 1 Price quality 1 beef (numeric) Daging Sapi Kualitas 2 Price quality 2 beef (numeric) Telur Ayam Price chicken eggs (numeric) Telur Ayam Ras Segar Price fresh broiler chicken eggs (numeric) Bawang Merah Price red onions (numeric) Bawang Merah Ukuran Sedang Price medium-sized red onions (numeric) Bawang Putih Price garlic (numeric) Bawang Putih Ukuran Sedang Price medium-sized garlic (numeric) Cabai Merah Price red chilies (numeric) Cabai Merah Besar Price large red chilies (numeric) Cabai Merah Keriting Price curly red chilies (numeric) Cabai Rawit Price bird's eye chilies (numeric) Cabai Rawit Hijau Price green bird's eye chilies (numeric) Cabai Rawit Merah Price red bird's eye chilies (numeric) Minyak Goreng Price cooking oil (numeric) Minyak Goreng Curah Price bulk cooking oil (numeric) Minyak Goreng Kemasan Bermerk 1 Price branded packaged cooking oil 1 (numeric) Minyak Goreng Kemasan Bermerk 2 Price branded packaged cooking oil 2 (numeric) Gula Pasir Price granulated sugar (numeric) Gula Pasir Kualitas Premium Price premium granulated sugar (numeric) Gula Pasir Lokal Price local granulated sugar (numeric)

title: Food Prices in Bali — Bali_tbl_df
text: Data taken ifpd package version 0.1.0

title: Food Prices in Bali — Bali_tbl_df
text: dataset name kept 'Bali_tbl_df' avoid confusion datasets R ecosystem. naming convention helps distinguish dataset part IndonesiAPIs package assists users identifying specific characteristics. suffix 'tbl_df' indicates dataset tibble object. original content modified way.

title: Bali Popular Tourist Destinations (2022) — bali_tourism_tbl_df
text: dataset, bali_tourism_tbl_df, tibble containing information 34 popular tourist destinations Bali, Indonesia, 2022. includes variables place names, locations, coordinates, Google Maps ratings, review counts, sources, descriptions, approximate tourism visitor fees USD. dataset preserves original structure source Kaggle.

title: Bali Popular Tourist Destinations (2022) — bali_tourism_tbl_df
Bali Popular Tourist Destinations (2022) — bali_tourism_tbl_df
text: tibble 34 observations 8 variables: Place Name tourist destination (character) Location General location area destination (character) Coordinate Geographic coordinates destination (character) Google Maps Rating Average rating Google Maps (numeric) Google Reviews (Count) Number reviews Google Maps (numeric) Source Source information destination (character) Description Brief description tourist destination (character) Tourism/Visitor Fee (approx USD) Approximate fee tourists visitors, USD (character)

title: Bali Popular Tourist Destinations (2022) — bali_tourism_tbl_df

title: Bali Popular Tourist Destinations (2022) — bali_tourism_tbl_df

what: Get Key Country Information About Indonesia from the REST Countries API — get_country_info_idn
title: Get Key Country Information About Indonesia from the REST Countries API — get_country_info_idn
text: Retrieves selected, essential information Indonesia using REST Countries API. function returns tibble core details population, area, capital, region, official language(s). See API documentation https://restcountries.com/. Example API usage: https://restcountries.com/v3.1/name/indonesia?fullText=true.

title: Get Key Country Information About Indonesia from the REST Countries API — get_country_info_idn
Get Key Country Information About Indonesia from the REST Countries API — get_country_info_idn
text: REST Countries API: https://restcountries.com/

title: Get Key Country Information About Indonesia from the REST Countries API — get_country_info_idn
text: tibble following 8 columns: name_common: Common name country. name_official: Official name country. region: Geographical region. subregion: Subregion within continent. capital: Capital city. area: Area square kilometers. population: Population country. languages: Languages spoken country, comma-separated string. Returns NULL API unavailable returns error.

title: Get Key Country Information About Indonesia from the REST Countries API — get_country_info_idn
text: function sends GET request REST Countries API. API returns data Indonesia, function extracts returns selected fields tibble. request fails Indonesia found, returns NULL prints message.

title: Get Key Country Information About Indonesia from the REST Countries API — get_country_info_idn
text: Requires internet connection. data retrieved real time REST Countries API.

title: Get Key Country Information About Indonesia from the REST Countries API — get_country_info_idn
code: # \donttest{ get_country_info_idn() #> # A tibble: 1 × 8 #>   name_common name_official region subregion capital   area population languages #>   <chr>       <chr>         <chr>  <chr>     <chr>    <dbl>      <int> <chr>     #> 1 Indonesia   Republic of … Asia   South-Ea… Jakarta 1.90e6  284438782 Indonesi… # }

what: Get Under-5 Mortality Rate in Indonesia from World Bank — get_indonesia_child_mortality
title: Get Under-5 Mortality Rate in Indonesia from World Bank — get_indonesia_child_mortality
text: Retrieves Indonesia's -five mortality rate (per 1,000 live births) years 2010 2022 using World Bank Open Data API. indicator used SH.DYN.MORT.

title: Get Under-5 Mortality Rate in Indonesia from World Bank — get_indonesia_child_mortality

text: World Bank Open Data API: https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SH.DYN.MORT

title: Get Under-5 Mortality Rate in Indonesia from World Bank — get_indonesia_child_mortality
text: tibble following columns: indicator: Indicator name (e.g., "Mortality rate, -5 (per 1,000 live births)") country: Country name ("Indonesia") year: Year data (integer) value: -5 mortality rate per 1,000 live births (numeric) Returns NULL API unavailable returns error.

title: Get Under-5 Mortality Rate in Indonesia from World Bank — get_indonesia_child_mortality
text: function sends GET request World Bank API. API request fails returns error status code, function returns NULL informative message.

title: Get Under-5 Mortality Rate in Indonesia from World Bank — get_indonesia_child_mortality
text: Requires internet connection.

title: Get Under-5 Mortality Rate in Indonesia from World Bank — get_indonesia_child_mortality

what: Get Official Public Holidays in Indonesia for a Given Year — get_indonesia_holidays
title: Get Official Public Holidays in Indonesia for a Given Year — get_indonesia_holidays
text: Retrieves list official public holidays Indonesia specific year using Nager.Date public holidays API. function returns tibble containing date holiday, name local language (Indonesian), English name. useful academic, planning, data analysis purposes. information retrieved directly Nager.Date API reflects current status holidays requested year. field names returned consistent API structure.

title: Get Official Public Holidays in Indonesia for a Given Year — get_indonesia_holidays
Get Official Public Holidays in Indonesia for a Given Year — get_indonesia_holidays
text: Data obtained Nager.Date API: https://date.nager./

title: Get Official Public Holidays in Indonesia for a Given Year — get_indonesia_holidays
text: year integer indicating year (e.g., 2024 2025).

title: Get Official Public Holidays in Indonesia for a Given Year — get_indonesia_holidays
text: tibble following columns: date: Date holiday (class Date) local_name: Holiday name local language (Indonesian) name: Holiday name English Returns NULL API unavailable returns error.

title: Get Official Public Holidays in Indonesia for a Given Year — get_indonesia_holidays
code: # \donttest{ get_indonesia_holidays(2024) #> # A tibble: 8 × 3 #>   date       local_name                                      name             #>   <date>     <chr>                                           <chr>            #> 1 2024-01-01 Tahun Baru Masehi                               New Year's Day   #> 2 2024-03-29 Wafat Isa Almasih                               Good Friday      #> 3 2024-03-31 Paskah                                          Easter Sunday    #> 4 2024-05-01 Hari Buruh Internasional                        Labour Day       #> 5 2024-05-09 Kenaikan Isa Almasih                            Ascension Day    #> 6 2024-06-01 Hari Lahir Pancasila                            Pancasila Day    #> 7 2024-08-17 Hari Ulang Tahun Kemerdekaan Republik Indonesia Independence Day #> 8 2024-12-25 Hari Raya Natal                                 Christmas Day    get_indonesia_holidays(2025) #> # A tibble: 8 × 3 #>   date       local_name                                      name             #>   <date>     <chr>                                           <chr>            #> 1 2025-01-01 Tahun Baru Masehi                               New Year's Day   #> 2 2025-04-18 Wafat Isa Almasih                               Good Friday      #> 3 2025-04-20 Paskah                                          Easter Sunday    #> 4 2025-05-01 Hari Buruh Internasional                        Labour Day       #> 5 2025-05-29 Kenaikan Isa Almasih                            Ascension Day    #> 6 2025-06-01 Hari Lahir Pancasila                            Pancasila Day    #> 7 2025-08-17 Hari Ulang Tahun Kemerdekaan Republik Indonesia Independence Day #> 8 2025-12-25 Hari Raya Natal                                 Christmas Day    # }

what: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets — IndonesiAPIs
title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets — IndonesiAPIs
text: package provides functions access data public RESTful APIs including 'Nager.Date', 'World Bank API', 'REST Countries API', retrieving real-time historical data related Indonesia, holidays, economic indicators, international demographic geopolitical indicators. package also includes curated collection open datasets focused Indoesia, covering topics consumer prices, poverty probability, food prices region, tourism destinations, minimum wage statistics.

title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets — IndonesiAPIs
text: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs Curated Datasets  Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs Curated Datasets.

title: IndonesiAPIs: Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets — IndonesiAPIs
text: Maintainer: Renzo Caceres Rossi arenzocaceresrossi@gmail.com

title: Coordinate of Several Regions in Indonesia — indonesia_latlong_df

title: Coordinate of Several Regions in Indonesia — indonesia_latlong_df

title: Coordinate of Several Regions in Indonesia — indonesia_latlong_df
text: dataset name kept 'indonesia_latlong_df' avoid confusion datasets R ecosystem. naming convention helps distinguish dataset part IndonesiAPIs package assists users identifying specific characteristics. suffix 'df' indicates dataset data frame. original content modified way.

what: View Available Datasets in IndonesiAPIs — view_datasets_IndonesiAPIs
title: View Available Datasets in IndonesiAPIs — view_datasets_IndonesiAPIs

title: View Available Datasets in IndonesiAPIs — view_datasets_IndonesiAPIs
View Available Datasets in IndonesiAPIs — view_datasets_IndonesiAPIs
text: character vector names available datasets.         datasets found, returns empty character vector.

title: View Available Datasets in IndonesiAPIs — view_datasets_IndonesiAPIs
code: if (requireNamespace("IndonesiAPIs", quietly = TRUE)) {   library(IndonesiAPIs)   view_datasets_IndonesiAPIs() } #> Datasets available in the 'IndonesiAPIs' package: #> [1] "Bali_tbl_df"              "DKIJakarta_tbl_df"        #> [3] "SumateraUtara_tbl_df"     "bali_tourism_tbl_df"      #> [5] "indonesia_latlong_df"     "indonesia_minwage_tbl_df"

title: IndonesiAPIs 0.1.1
text: Improved error handling API functions comply CRAN policies regarding internet resources functions now fail gracefully informative messages APIs unavailable return errors Added timeout handling (10 seconds) prevent hanging connections API requests Added robust error handling tryCatch() blocks network errors, HTTP errors, JSON parsing errors Functions now return NULL clear messages instead throwing errors API calls fail

title: IndonesiAPIs 0.1.1
text: Updated function examples use \donttest{} instead (interactive()) prevent issues R CMD check Enhanced documentation clarify functions return NULL APIs unavailable Added detailed error messages guide users connection issues occur

title: IndonesiAPIs 0.1.1
text: API-calling functions updated improved error handling: get_country_info_idn() - REST Countries API get_indonesia_child_mortality() - World Bank API get_indonesia_cpi() - World Bank API get_indonesia_energy_use() - World Bank API get_indonesia_gdp() - World Bank API get_indonesia_holidays() - Nager.Date API get_indonesia_hospital_beds() - World Bank API get_indonesia_life_expectancy() - World Bank API get_indonesia_literacy_rate() - World Bank API get_indonesia_population() - World Bank API get_indonesia_unemployment() - World Bank API

title: IndonesiAPIs 0.1.1
text: HTTP requests now include httr::timeout(10) parameter Added http_error() http_status() checks robust HTTP error detection Replaced stop() message() + return(NULL) pattern graceful failures Enhanced @importFrom declarations include new error handling functions

title: IndonesiAPIs 0.1.1
text: DOI version: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17731434

title: IndonesiAPIs 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2025-09-09

title: IndonesiAPIs 0.1.0
text: First release IndonesiAPIs package Added view_datasets_IndonesiAPIs() function explore available datasets Access Indonesian Data via Public APIs Curated Datasets

title: IndonesiAPIs 0.1.0
text: get_country_info_idn() - Retrieve key country information Indonesia get_indonesia_child_mortality() - Get -5 mortality rate data get_indonesia_cpi() - Get Consumer Price Index data get_indonesia_energy_use() - Get energy use per capita data get_indonesia_gdp() - Get GDP current US dollars get_indonesia_holidays() - Get official public holidays year get_indonesia_hospital_beds() - Get hospital beds per 1,000 people get_indonesia_life_expectancy() - Get life expectancy birth get_indonesia_literacy_rate() - Get adult literacy rate (15+) get_indonesia_population() - Get total population data get_indonesia_unemployment() - Get unemployment rate data

title: IndonesiAPIs 0.1.0
text: REST Countries API country information World Bank Open Data API economic social indicators Nager.Date API public holidays

title: IndonesiAPIs 0.1.0
text: view_datasets_IndonesiAPIs() - Interactive function explore view available datasets
